inn1.comm: gentle starter, pitched up on leg stump, Tharanga defends
fuller ball, 132ks, gets some shape from leg to middle and Tharanga counters with a drive to midwicket
angles it across Tharanga who opts to leave it be for Dhoni
edged and taken! Tyagi sends down the same delivery that angles across the stumps but instead of leaving it Tharanga goes for a drive without much footwork and edges straight into first slip's lap
leans into a wide half-volley and square-drives nicely but Kohli intercepts at point with a dive
angles across Sangakkara who lets it go
and here's Dilshan striking his first ball on return, a length ball outside off, between the covers
change of length, Sree holds it back and Dilshan lets it go
fuller and straighter and with minimal adjustment to clear the front leg, Dilshan punches the ball back on the volley wide of Sreesanth and mid-off can't stop it
now that is the length to bowl, just drags it back and Dilshan leaves
134ks, hits a good length and wobbles away off the seam from just outside off stump and Dilshan, itching to clobber off the front foot, lets it go again
cracks a square drive off the length ball straight to point
good line and length, gets some movement from middle and off, Sangakkara drives hesitantly to the off side
back of a length, tapped to cover, glances up and sets off
short ball down the stumps and that's rightfully pulled to long leg
ooh lucky to get away with that! Short and wide and slapped nicely but straight to Jadeja at backward point
slapped! Pitches back of a length outside off and without much footwork Dilshan flays that between cover and point, on the rise, for four more, what a shot
136ks, back of a length on the stumps, played to cover
pitches it up outside off, no movement, Sanga shoulders arms
good shot, just stands there and biffs a fractionally fuller ball wide of the man at short cover, was in the air marginally but was hit very hard
short, wide and slashed up and over backward point for four, third man had no chance to get around and stop that brute of a shot from Sangakkara
fuller, which means on a good length after that last ball, 134ks, gets some cuts off the deck with the angle and Sangakkara decides to leave that one be
tidier ball, on a length on off stump and makes him drive it back
pitches on a length and again Sanga drives back to Sree
played late! Short of a length outside off, Dilshan steers the ball between backward point and first slip and with no third man in place that is four, so smart
and again, four more! Dilshan is toying here as first slip is removed, he just angles the bat and runs the ball off the face past where the catcher just was
oh ho ho! What fun to watch! Tyagi opts to go fuller and watches in agony as Dilshan drives hard and picks the gap between two men in the covers
now he drags in a short ball on the stumps which is pulled to deep square
hits a length, 138ks, gets some shape from middle and leg and Sangakkara defends it back watchfully
short of a length, he rides the bounce and drops the ball in front of point
beaten first ball as he opens the face and looks to run a wide ball down for four, but the ball wobbles away and beats the bat on the angle
short ball and Dilshan pulls into the yawning gap at midwicket

good catch! Zaheer again angles it across at short of a length, Dilshan sees room and tries to get four to the vacant third man but doesn't play the ball down enough and Gambhir at that fly slip takes a smart catch low to the ground, just the effort needed to stop Dilshan
full ball outside leg, turned straight to the fielder
beaten! Zaheer aims more for middle and off and gets the fuller ball to move late and beat the bat as Jayawardene pushes down the wrong line
pitches leg and shapes across and he has to defend, good ball
full delivery on the pads, misses out, gets just a single to fine leg
digs it in short, the ball jags back in from outside off, but Mahela has his off stump covered as he leaves the ball alone. It passes over the stumps anyway
dis it in short again, into the hips this time, defended towards midwicket
provides him the width this time, and is cut away towards third man
stays back of a length, Sanga looks to cut but there isn't much room and ends up hitting towards cover
the change-up delivery, too full, on the pads, and the gift voucher is encashed through a flick to square leg
angled across him, Mahela comes forward and shoulders arms
strays on the pads this time, and Mahela glances it down towards fine leg, the fine leg is placed too square and can't get around
goes back to outside off, and Jaya leaves it alone
closer to the stumps, he has to play at it, which he does with an open face, towards point
looks to tuck him up, short of a length, around middle, defended to leg
off the splice of the bat, and a full-length dive from Raina at cover saves runs - India have fielded better today than they have in a long long time
angled across the left-hand batsman who lets it go through to the keeper
a touch closer to the stumps, Sanga shoulders arms again
and again, a hat-trick of left-alones, back of a length, slightly outside off, angling away
good carry here, again pitching just outside off, just back of a length, goes as high as Dhoni's shoulders
this time he crashes him through point, it is a matter of slightly extra width, which frees his arms and he pounces on it
lovely cover-drive, another Tyagi over ends with a boundary, he pitches up this time, Sanga gets to the pitch of it, and drives it handsomely, wide of mid-off

another catch, that's three in three for India, a welcome change from recent matches! There is a short cover placed for a drive to the ball that is not quite full, and Mahela walks into that trap. He is slightly early into the drive, checks his shot and Kohli takes a sharp catch, with hands pointing skywards
back of a length, on the stumps, defended
fluent drive, but straight towards cover
shorter, angling across him, Samaraweera reaches for it, and is beaten
this is closer to the stumps, Samaraweera gets across and shoulders arms
second wicket-maiden of the innings, keeps it back of a length, Samaraweera gets back and across and defends
leans into a full ball and slashes in the air but safe of the catchers, third man gets into  play to do the fielding

plumb! On the stumps, Samaraweera walks across the sticks in an attempt to flick to the leg side but is late on the shot and rapped in front, Sreesanth belts out an appeal and the umpire raises his finger, looked pretty straightforward to the naked eye
full and wide, he shoulders arms
overpitched, he square drives to Gambhir at point
comes well forward and eases the ball to cover
pitches it up and gets Kandamby again defending
short of a length on off stump and defended
gets over a length ball and defends it to cover
chops a wider ball into the ground in front of cover and steals a single
ah what a ball! Pitches full and lands on the seam just around off stump, forces  Kandamby to play at it, and then the late shape does him in
gets back in line and pushes back another nice shaped delivery
full on off stump, some shape,  Kandamby drives and turns the ball to midwicket
pitched up and defended
full just outside off, Sanga opens the face and dabs the ball in front of cover and point and calls on Kandamby for the sinle
wider ball, he leans into it and cannot beat cover or point
back of a length on middle and off and he defends
uppercuts a short ball to Jadeja's right side at backward point, he dives and fumbles and Kandamby gets a single
full and with some shape due to the natural angle, Sanga lets it go
nice drive there to a full ball, leans in and punches into the off side, one of the men in the covers runs across and lets throw but cannot hit the stumps
hits a length and the ball straightens, he gets in line and plays it back
straighter ball angles back and he falls over looking to work it to leg
wider ball on a length, no movement, left alone by the batsman
walks across the sticks and on-drives a fuller ball down to mid-on

madness! Zaheer bowls it short of a length on the body, Sangakkara rides the bounce and turns the ball toward Karthik at square leg and sets off, which gets Kandamby bolting down his end, but then the captain hesitates and turns back, by which time Kandamby has nearly reached him, Karthik releases the ball on the bounce to Zaheer who collects and breaks the sticks with the batsman short ... talk about being sold down the river
pitches on a length outside off and Sangakkara leave be
beaten first ball, flirting outside off stump to a length ball
tip and run, just gets over the ball and squirts it toward point
short of a length outside off, he cuts well but Jadeja intercepts at point
fuller in length, gets good cut off the deck, Sanga lets it go
slower ball, enough width outside off for Sanga to hang back and slash the ball between two fielders out to the sweeper at deep point
wild shot from the new man, just stands there and throws the kitchen sink at a short ball and is beaten all ends up
back of a length on middle and off, he gets across and works the ball to the on side but cannot find the gap
this time he hangs back and then opens the face to guide the ball wide of backward point for a single
good short ball, rising and coming into Perera who jumps up and fends it back down
there he goes, backing away and swinging across the line to a length ball and missing by some distance
fuller ball cuts into leg stump and he works it toward midwicket
length ball outside off, played down into the ground to backward point
tossed up on middle and off and Perera stabs at it in defence
floated up again, the googly, pushed off the front foot to cover
flatter ball, pushed to the off side again
shorter ball, spins back, he makes room and cuts to backward point
nice flight on that one, gets some turn back in, Perera defends
dropped! Mishra tosses up another good googly, which makes Perera play forward but the bounce draws a nick that Dhoni fumbles and puts down
good shot! Slides into the pads and he eases a lovely shot past midwicket
now he drives on the off side, reaching out and playing a pleasing square drive
short of a length and he heaves at it, getting a top edge down the leg side safely wide of Dhoni for four
another short ball, this one coming onto Perera's body, he takes his eyes off it and heaves and cannot connect, Dhoni takes it and Zaheer appeals unconvincingly
length ball, Perera makes room and punches into the covers
walks down the track and punches the ball into the covers, there's more hesitation in the calling but in the end the batsmen are home safe
flat ball, googly, Perera backs away and chops the ball between cover and point and gets four as there is no protection in the deep

good catch in the deep and what a silly shot from this kid! Mishra slows it up and tosses the ball invitingly, Perera in a rush of blood skips out and slogs aimlessly, the ball goes up and up in the air and out at deep midwicket covers a long distance and dives to his right as he takes a nice catch
spins away, he makes room and dabs the ball into the covers
slower ball, well flighted, Randiv defends it back
tossed up again and he pushes into the off side
tossed up, some turn, defended off the front foot
he's going for it, Sangakkara, who dances down and drives the length ball hard and in the air but just between two fielders
angles it back in, Sangakkara allows it come on and dabs the ball to point
on the stumps and he works the ball to midwicket
comes onto the front foot and gently pushes a length ball toward cover and point and calls Randiv across for the run
nice drive from Randiv, eases onto the front foot and puts the ball into the gap at cover for four
wider ball, gets some cut off the seam and Randiv shoulders arms
tossed up on off stump and Sanga defends it back
wider ball, spins across from outside off, Sangakkara skips out and hits against the turn with a slog sweep wide of midwicket
pushes him onto the back foot and Randiv defends nicely
slow legbreak, pitches just around off, Randiv pushes it to cover
slower ball, flighted up on the stumps, he pushes it over the covers intentionally and gets a couple as Tyagi runs around to field in the deep
googly, fuller too, and he comes forward to defend
flat ball, he makes room and dabs the ball wide of covers, Yuvraj picks the ball up late in the deep and they get two, then when the poor return misses the stumps they get a third run
slow ball slides down the pads, Randiv is late on the shot, Jadeja appeals but that ball was missing everything
tossed up on middle and leg, arm ball, played back
flat on middle and off, no turn, watchfully defended
now he gets some turn away from the bat and gets an edge that runs away safely as Randiv pushes at it
comes out but the shot across the line is not on, and he defends

tossed up on middle and leg, no turn, Randiv gets a top edge on the sweep, Karthik from slip runs across and dives and gets a hand on the ball, losing it as he hits the ground, a superb attempt from him there ... you have to put that down as a drop but no hard words for Karthik, because that was headed away from everyone and he went after it from a wide fly slip
comes forward and pushes the ball wide of the infield
tossed up and defended
skips out and slog-sweeps over midwicket for two more
ah, well bowled, he beats Sanga in the flight, he ends up stabbing at the ball and it runs wide for leg byes
tossed up and played back
and there's his fifty, hangs back and puts away the short and wide ball past cover
skips out, is nearly beaten in the flight but carries on with the shot he had in mind, scooping it over the infield for a lucky couple runs
too much turn down the pads, wide called
another poor short ball is cut away into the off side
flatter ball, just outside off, worked back to Jadeja
uses his crease well, stepping across to off and punching the ball down to long-on
turns in, Randiv gets a long ways forward and is hit on the flap, but the ball was turning down too much
short outside off, put away wide of backward point
tossed up on a length, no turn, Randiv makes room and punches to cover
topspinner, he again goes onto the back foot and this time beats the man at cover
slider this time, quicker ball, Sangakkara hangs on the back foot and dabs the ball to cover
gently flighted on middle and off and he pats it back
quicker ball forces him back and Sanga defends to Mishra
again prefers to go back and punch the ball to extra cover
spins back in, he gets into position and on-drives a single
flat and short, Randiv goes back and punches to cover
tossed up, some drift, patted back
another short ball, Randiv goes for the pull but takes it high on the shoulder of the bat and so very nearly pops a catch to midwicket, but the ball dies on the catcher
slides down the pads, he sweeps but mistimes the shot
uses his feet and punches the ball down to long-off
slower ball, invitingly tossed up on a length and Randiv makes room and slogs against the turn but the ball does not carry to mid-on
shorter ball, punched to cover
skips out, is not to the pitch but slogs any ways and gets a leading edge safely over mid-off
googly, he goes back and slashes into the off side for a single
looped up on off stump, he rolls the wrists and flicks a single
tossed up outside off, Sangakkara drives past extra cover for one
slower ball drifts down the pads and Randiv pats it away
slides down again and this time he glances it for a single
too short and lucky to get away with that one, as Sangakkara pulls from outside off stump but straight to Raina at midwicket
looped up outside off and he drives it to cover
short and back-cut out to Tyagi at deep backward point
tossed up, he defends but Mishra has overstepped so free hit time
tossed up gently outside leg stump and Sanga picks it over midwicket
tosses it outside off to get Randiv onto the front foot, he drives into the off side to bring up the 50 partnership
turns the ball off his pads for two more, all too easy at the moment
quicker ball, no turn, Sangakkara defends to cover

big hit, comes dancing out and swings across the line, against the turn, and gets a top edge over midwicket that drops in front of the boundary as Tyagi runs across, he slides and tries to stops the ball but loses it between his legs and his body just brushes the ropes as he starts to get up and see where the ball is
slower ball flighted on a length outside off, played straight to cover
on the pads and knocked away to square leg
quicker ball, slider on middle and leg, patted back
takes on the ball this time with mid-on being up, clubbing it over the infield, drops safely in no man's land
got em! Terrible ball but India won't mind! Short ball sits up, hurries onto Sangakkara who makes a meal of a pull shot, getting a top edge that goes up and settles in Raina's hands at midwicket
slides it across and Thushara stretches forward to block
tossed up and defended
pitches short of a length outside off and he flirts and misses
nice full ball on leg stump, nearly a yorker, played to midwicket
fuller in length outside off, he wafts and gets an inside edge onto his shoes
overpitches the attempted yorker on the pads, Randiv pats away the low full toss toward midwicket
beaten on the angle, just limply hanging the bat outside off stump
short of a length, pitches leg and angles across and he defends
slowly tossed up, Randiv drives it back to the bowler
too straight, turns down the pads and he glances it away
comes onto the front foot and drives the full ball to short cover
drives at a wider one that turns away, beaten in the flight, and slashes an edge over the covers safely
quicker ball pushed through quicker and Thushara is beaten again
slower ball, goes across, he chases and misses
chases a wide length ball and slashes it down to Jadeja at backward point, who dives to his right and dislocates his finger on the dive, which forces him off the field
short of a length on the stumps and he defends just wide of square leg
poor ball, short and wide and slashed square on the off side for two
hits a length and Randiv plays a very good drive into the gap at extra cover
short of a length, slides back in, he squirts it to backward point
more room on offer outside off and Randiv lashes it past a diving point fielder, Yuvraj has more work to do out on the ropes
pitches on the stumps and slides in, Thushara clips to midwicket
short and wide, he gets up and slaps the ball to point, who fumbles
short ball outside off, good carry, Thushara leaves it be
short of a length, cuts back in, he defends it back
well played, gets over the ball and guides it wide of point for one
pitches short of a length outside off, Randiv pushes it to point
beats him with a length ball just outside off, nips past the loose drive
well played by Randiv, making room and dancing out to slap another length ball over extra cover for four
short of a length on middle and leg, cuts in, he shapes to work it way and gets squared up but manages to play it safely to the off side
too short and wide, so Randiv steers it to third man for one
short ball, he stands his ground and defends nicely
short and this time on the body, Thushara fends it off the hips for one
just like that! Sees a length ball and swings it over midwicket for four
bad ball, short and wide and Thushara steers it down to third man
gets back to the leg stump and pushes a short ball to point
again Randiv steps away and swings but is this time beaten
length ball shapes across late from just outside leg stump, forcing a tentative Randiv to push it to cover
digs it in short, he hops back and plays it down to backward point
tossed up, spins away, Thushara pushes and gets an edge to point, Randiv has to turn around after setting off and manages to ground his bat as a throw from Yuvraj comes in
tossed up and defended this time
short ball, stays low, looks like the toppie, Thushara steers it past point
good flight on that legbreak, which Randiv plays to cover
some turn there, and that beats the bat as Randiv looks to steer off the back foot, Dhoni however fumbles the collection
flights it up on a length and this time Randiv has to defend, but the ball rolls past Mishra who cannot get across and misfields with his foot
tossed up, no turn, Randiv stretches forward and defends
sweeps with the turn to a fuller ball and gets a single
slider, to which Thushara goes back and plays
again too straight, Thushara turns the ball to midwicket
too short a length and Thushara paddles it from in front of the stumps
goes back to leg and makes room for himself, then puts the short ball away into the gap at cover
tossed up on middle and off, Randiv drives it back to the bowler
hangs it in the air a fraction longer and then gets some dip, Randiv waits before clipping the ball to mid-on for a single
well tossed up outside off but Thushara drives past extra cover for two
shorter ball, no turn, Thushara cuts and misses
tidier ball, angled back into the stumps and Thushara defends
this too pitches in line and gets him stretching forward to block
makes room to go inside-out past cover but the ball doesn't turn and so Randiv gets an inside edge on the booming drive
slog sweeps from outside off, no turn again and he misses the ball
pushes it on from middle and off and Thushara defends
quicker, flatter ball slides down leg stump, Thushara sweeps and gets struck on the pads, they all appeal but that looked to be doing too much
sweeps again and gets a faint inside edge for a single
pushes Randiv on the back foot and he plays it back
gets across and bunts the ball toward midwicket
sweeps one sliding down leg stump, gets a bit of wood on the inside edge
forces the wide ball nicely off the back foot but Jadeja dives at point
brings him on the front foot this time, pushing to cover
tossed up invitingly and Randiv slogs across the line to Tyagi at midwicket
flat on middle and leg and played back to Raina
slides down the pads, no connection with bat and wide is called
slower ball outside off on a length, Randiv leans forward and drives
slogs across the line at a wider one outside off and can't connect
pushed through faster, Thushara cracks it off the back foot to cover
slogs from outside off stump and picks the gap at square leg
fuller ball outside off, uses his feet and drives past cover for one
nicely played, shuffles across the stumps and laps a ball from middle and leg
drives from the crease to the man at cover
gets the wrists into play as he clips the ball from just outside off
steps toward off stump and picks the ball off the sticks in the air over square leg
slower ball on a length, Thushara drives early and pops the ball up wide of cover
gets room outside off and slices the ball over the covers for one
gets down on bended knee and drives the ball straight to cover
there's a maiden ODI half-century - in fact his first in List A matches - and he leaps up and punches the air, after he tucks a short ball off his hips to square leg, well played
low full toss which Thushara drives superbly down past mid-off
gone this time, losing his cool and taking on a short ball outside off, the result is a top edge that Yuvraj keeps his eyes on as he runs across from backward point
on the stumps and driven into the off side for a quick single
low full toss on the pads, clipped out to the man at deep fine
hops to outside leg stump and pushes the short ball into the covers, calling for the single immediately and getting it too
tosses it up and Randiv, with a subtle adjustment to create room, drives the ball over the infield with the turn, a totally intentional shot for four more
timber! Randiv cannot pick the quicker googly that skids through after pitching and slides under the cross-batted shot to hit leg stump, end of a good half-century
slides down leg stump
even further down the pads
and again, Mishra just cannot control his line at the moment
that is better, slower legbreak outside off that turns past the bat
tossed up on middle and off and defended
loud appeal as Lakmal strides forward to a googly and gets hit on the pad, but the umpire shakes his head, perhaps uncertain by the stride forward, but well bowled
defends the last ball
onto the front foot, driving well but extra cover saves runs
down the pads, he swings and the ball brushes his legs
moves about in his crease, ends up pushing the ball back
slider, middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
tossed up generously, he dances out and heaves but can only inside-edge the ball to midwicket
tossed up and Lakmal defends to the off side to end a maiden over
all over, as Welegedara swings across the line to a wider, slower, well tossed up delivery outside off stump and misses, and Dhoni collects and breaks the sticks

inn2.comm: good length on the off stump and pushed to the off side
full and wide and he chases that and places it to extra cover, nice diving save there
opens the face of the bat and angles it wide of backward point
very similar shot, angled down to third man for a single this time
drifts on the body and he nudges it off his hips
this delivery really climbs on him and angles away, he gets his bat out and upper cuts over slip, third man is square
very good carry outside off and well left
digs it in short and the ball is directed at the rib cage, tries to run it down to fine leg but the keeper picks it up
great shot, it was short of a length but didn't give him enough width, he improvised well, rolled his wrists and cuts wide of point
down the leg side and he runs it down to fine leg
angles across the left hander and he shoulders arms
good line and length outside off, gets across and leaves it alone
excellent delivery, shapes away off the seam and beats the outside edge
the slower ball this time and he's beaten again, the ball bounces again before reaching Sangakkara
drifts on the pads and he flicks his wrists slightly and works it wide of midwicket, the ball races away
lovely shot, better than the first one, this was a bit shorter and towards the pads again, he moves back and deftly flicks it wide of square leg
stays beside the line and angles it down towards point
stays beside the line and taps it with soft hands in front of point and sets off
he oversteps, Karthik taps it in front of short cover
Free Hit bowls him the bouncer and he swivels and hooks, not in full control as it drops in front of fine leg
gives him width this time and he bisects short cover and short point with precision, angles it away very easily, a lesson in placement from a class player
comes round the wicket, he flicks it towards square leg and sets off very quickly, there's a direct hit but Karthik's safe, the 3rd umpire takes a look
back over the wicket to the right-hander, he gets his elbows high and angles it towards point
good length outside off, he taps it down to point
angles in to him and there's a thick outside edge which travels wide of first slip, third man is too square, well controlled shot
stays behind the line and defends with soft hands
doesn't bounce as much but he defends very firmly to the off side

big appeal for a caught behind, he directs the bouncer towards the body and he withdraws the shot, shoulders arms and the ball nearly brushes the glove, umpire Haque shakes his head, I need to see another replay of that
he's bowling with raw pace and gets excellent carry, good bowling
tucks it towards midwicket and Karthik sets off from the crease and scampers back, the under arm throw misses the stumps
slashed away! Gets width and a lot of bounce to work with outside off, just manages to slash it over first slip
he oversteps, defended to the off side
Free Hit 142 kph, he fails to out away that full toss despite giving room, the ball is clubbed straight to mid-on
gets beside the line and defends solidly
stays behind the line and defends to the off side
fuller in length and driven very firmly towards mid-off
he's punished yet again for bowling on the pads, very easily flicked away by Karthik past the big gap between mid-on and midwicket
goes across his stumps very early to unsettle the bowler and he turns his wrists and runs it down to fine leg, the fielder dives and fails to stop it
that's another overstep! Gambhir bends down and squeezes out a yorker to the off side
Free Hit he manages to put it away with a bang, gets across his stumps to a full delivery, bends down and gets underneath the bounce and mows it over midwicket
drifts on the body and he shuffles and clips him wide of square leg
comes round the wicket, gets forward to a full delivery and defends to cover
stays beside the line and angles it down to third man
fires it on a good length on middle and he plays it with the angle and flicks it wide of square leg, the ball travels quickly
beats him first up, lovely delivery, draws him forward and the ball straightens, beats the outside edge
good length on middle and leg, he clips him wide of square leg
best shot of the evening so far, Karthik takes a few paces down the pitch, gets beside the line and shapes to play a forward defensive push, he times it so well that it steams past point and cover
banged in short and Karthik has a wild swing, gets a thick top edge which comfortably clears the keeper
he's in sublime form tonight, not a bad delivery, good length outside off and he stays back, punches it just wide of mid-off, excellent timing and placement
stays back and defends
he bowls it full on the pads and Gambhir effortlessly flicks it wide of midwicket, just a gentle flick of the wrists
stays back and defends with soft hands, karthik is in a rush to get to the other side but is wisely sent back
lands outside off and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
comes round the wicket, he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
lands outside off and he gets across and shoulders arms
holds the length back outside off, he stays back and defends
bowls the slower ball down the leg side, the keeper fumbles and the batsmen take a single
gets a half stride forward and angles it to point
firmly defended towards point
lovely shot, not too much width on offer but he improvises and deftly angles it wide of the packed off side field, beats the fielders in the point region
full on the stumps and pushed down to short midwicket, good fielding
appeal for a lbw but he clearly hit it
tossed up on the off side and turned to the on side
gets forward and turns it down to short square leg
big appeal for a lbw, he was well forward and struck outside the line of leg
full outside off and pushed to cover
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man
cramped for width but he opens the face of the bat and chops it down to third man

falls short of a well deserved fifty! Good delivery by Thushara, pitches outside off on a fullish length and has karthik getting forward and across to angle it away, the thick outside edge is well taken by Sangakkara diving to his right
nice defensive shot to start off, gets behind the line
hits the deck hard and he sways back to evade it
knocks it softly to the on side and thinks of a single, he;s sent back
tossed up on middle and leg and defended
quicker through the air and defended
quick through the air and tucked away softly to square leg
good delivery! Squared up by the turn and bounce outside off, nearly takes the edge
softly angles it wide of slip, the ball runs down to third man and they push hard for the third
gets forward and defends
knocks it down with soft hands towards mid-on and sets off, good calling
gets beside the line and pushes it wide of extra cover
full outside the off stump and pushed down to cover
good length on middle and tucked away to square leg
tucked away down to midwicket
Dropped Straightforward chance fluffed by Dilshan! Gambhir slaps it straight to cover point, he looked like he didnt see it clearly
hits his pads as he tries to tuck it away, stifled appeal
angles it down to short third man for a single
tucked to the on side and they complete the second run easily, there's a wild throw to the bowler's end and they take the overthrow
gets forward and smothers the spin
gets well forward and defends back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, guided down to third man for a single
trying to get him to play that, bowled in the channel outside off, shoulders arms to that one
full and wide, reaches forward and drives it elegantly towards deep cover for a single
short of a length on middle, gets back and pulls it down to deep midwicket for a single
holds it back again, gets out of the crease and drops it into the off side, thinks of a single but it's not there

dropped, a fairly easy one, short on middle and he goes for the pull, connects well but its airy, Tharanga runs in from deep midwicket and it's heading for his throat and he spills it, straightforward chance goes down
angling it on leg stump, tries to work it into the leg side, would have gone down after striking him on his pads
ooh, short of a good length on the off, tries to dab at it, gets an inside edge on the pads and it strikes Sangakkara on the helmet
worked away into the leg side for a single
straying on the pads, gets a faint tickle as he tries to turn it fine, three more to the score. actually it came off the pads
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down into the off side and steals an easy single
bowled it full on the off, pushed firmly but straight to mid-on, Gambhir calls for a single but is sent back wisely
back of a length, rocks back and punches it towards deep cover for a single
back of a length outside off, tries to turn it towards midwicket, zips through him to the keeper
rocks forward and plays it in the direction of cover
short and wide, slapped away into the deep towards deep cover for  single to keep the strike
angling in towards middle and leg, defends it dead on the pitch
short of a length outside off, chopped it towards point
needless appeal from Sangakkara, Gambhir charges down the pitch to tickle it into the leg side and is struck on the pads
went on straight, shortish outside off, shoulders arms but he was expecting it to spin there
pushed away into the leg side wide of midwicket for a single
bowls it on a good length on the off at 134 kmph, defended back to the bowler
nicely bowled, pitched it up on the off, pushed it through the line towards mid-off
shortish on the off, worked away off the back foot towards deep square leg for a single
angling it in towards off, opts to play out of his crease, turning it towards midwicket
bowled it on a good length on the off, played back firmly towards the bowler
short of a length outside off, cut down towards point
makes room and slashes it wide of point into the deep for a single to bring up his half-century
driven off the front foot towards midwicket
whipped away really fine off his pads, deep backward square leg has quite some distance to cover and they've taken three by the time he's returned the throw to the keeper
an easy single, getting back and just pressing it away
short of a length, tried to force it through the leg side, found midwicket
short of a length outside off, tries to slash it hard through point, misses
short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket
perfectly placed, drifting on the pads and he flicks it away elegantly to beat that gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a boundary
back of a length on middle, ducks under it easily
short of a length outside leg stump, tries to pull it behind square, doesn't connect
back of a length, upper-cuts it behind point towards third man for a single
keeping it straight on middle, turned away towards midwicket
pitched it up on the off, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
shortish on the off, knocks it down into the leg side in front of midwicket
hurling it full outside off, tries to drive it hard past extra cover, the bat turns in his hand and he ends up playing it towards midwicket
short of a good length outside off, knocks it down towards point
shortish on middle, played off the back foot to midwicket
shortish outside off, cracked off the back foot towards cover
striking it well but finding the fielders, lands it on a length on the off, pushed it towards mid-on
slower one bowled short on the leg stump, worked it away behind square leg for a well-run couple
slower one bowled short on the off, dropped it towards a gully who's just come in
short and wide, opened the face to guide it down to third man for a single, past that gully fielder
slightly short on the off, rocks back and punches it past the covers for a single to keep the strike
short of a length on leg stump, tickles it down to fine leg for a couple of runs
full, down the leg side, flicks it away really fine to beat the fielder in the deep to the ropes, four more
lands on a length outside off, cracked hard off the front foot towards deep cover for a single to raise the 50-run stand
slightly short on the off, guided towards third man for one more
slower one, the offcutter, rocks back and knocks it into the leg side
short of a length on middle, whipped away towards deep square leg for one more
gets on the back foot and punches it confidently towards cover
short on middle, pulls it away stylishly towards deep square leg for a single
full and wide, comes down the track and absolutely creams it through extra cover to beat the two fielders in the deep to the ropes, powerfully struck, raced away
short of a length outside off, runs it down towards third man for a single
short on leg stump, tries to smack it fine, mistimes it in the direction of fine leg
had picked his area there, short and wide and guided it really late, went really fine and beat third man to the boundary
lands on a length on middle, gets across and works it to midwicket
short of a length on the off, drops it in front of extra cover and races off for a single
gets on the back foot, it's slightly short and he taps it into the leg side
short of a good length outside off at 128 kmph, drops it in front of cover
bowls it on a good length on the off, plays it respectfully back to the bowler
back of a length, stands tall and drops it behind point for a quick single
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards mid-off
hurling it on middle, slightly short, whipped down towards fine leg for a single
the field on the off side is up and Gambhir crashed that through extra cover, pitched it up, he got forward and drove it firmly, there was a deep cover in place but even he couldn't get to it
short of a length outside off, the slower one, left it alone to the keeper
back of a length outside off, tries to upper cut, doesn't connect
pushes it off the front foot towards mid-off
slower one bowled short outside off, slapped towards deep cover for a single

Gambhir goes, lands on leg stump and he tries to turn it away, appears as though he was into the shot a little too early, got a leading edge straight to mid-on running in, soft dismissal but he's put India on course, Welegedara the catcher
presents the full face, pitched up, in the slot, there to hit and he drove it hard through the line past the bowler and mid-off to the ropes
four more, short outside off, seized the length early, rocked back and pulled it fiercely wide of a diving midwicket to the boundary, slapped it with contempt

slower one bowled short, waited for it to cut in and dabbed it wide of third man, scampers back for the second, the throw is to the non-striker's end and Kohli warns his partner who stretches to reach the crease in time
bowls it on a good length outside off, defended wide of extra cover for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, tries to run it down to third man for a single, doesn't connect
angling in towards middle, chips it uppishly between midwicket and square leg for a couple
short of a length outside off, stays rooted to the crease and knocks it down hard towards extra cover
short of a good length outside off, tries to force it off the back foot, gets a thick edge down towards third man for a single
bouncer, banged in short outside off, allows it through to the keeper
low full toss outside off, steered straight to deep point for a single
shortish on leg stump, works  it away wide of short fine leg for three runs, good work by the fielder there, Lakmal, to drag it back just in time
pushed it full outside off, driven towards mid-off

Kohli goes for the big one, full and wide and he tries to dismiss it into the stands over long-off, gets a thick outside edge wide of third man, an accurate throw from third man, Sangakkara smartly allows it through onto the stumps at the striker's end, Kohli was taking it easy there, got there just in time, appeal for run out and replays show he was just in
reaches his half-century in style, he's in good nick here, full toss outside off, smashes it between extra cover and mid-off to the boundary
held it back, bowled it short on the off, goes for the pull but it's a touch too high
moves across his stumps and clips him away down to fine leg
excellent wristwork there, typical Azharuddin, full on middle and leg and he turns his wrists and works it wide of midwicket
it's an overstep, comes round the wicket and bowls a hip high full toss which he whips away down to long leg
Free Hit It's another full toss from round the wicket but he ends up mistiming it down to mid-on
too wide outside the off stump and it nearly landed outside the pitch
that just races away, down the leg side and he gets a gentle tickle to it which is enough to beat the diving keeper
the carnage continues, he bowls it short of a length, sits up nicely for Kohli to club it past square leg
full toss outside off and he slaps it down to sweeper cover, 20 off the over
full outside off and spooned in the air and the ball drops short of Kandamby st mid-off
good length outside off and firmly punched down to sweeper cover
that's a good yorker, he saw Yuvraj making room and fired it on the blockhole, squeezed out to the on side
that's a beamer! The ball slipped out of Welegedara's hands and sailed safely over Yuvraj's helmet and beat Sanga as well
a high full toss is punched down the ground to long-on, they jog the single and India win this very easily, with a bonus point
